EmailTemplate.subject: Following up - your collaboration solution
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
As one of PGi’s meetings & collaborations experts, I am keenly aware of the collaboration challenges faced by enterprise organizations, particularly HR departments. PGi has over 40,000 customers worldwide and works with 75% of the Fortune 100™.
We offer a suite of collaboration solutions to support your unique video, web or audio needs. Whether for your individual department or across the organization – PGi makes it easier to meet anyone, anywhere, anytime, on virtually any device. For more information on our collaboration solutions check out the video links below:
-iMeet – virtual face-to-face meetings anytime, anywhere in HD – intuitive collaboration tools, no guest downloads or special hardware required. https://www.youtube.com/watch_popup?v=Tjz0SXinvis&feature=channel_video_title
-GlobalMeet – delivers easy to use audio-only or web-conferencing options for you to present to colleagues across the organization or anywhere around the globe. http://youtu.be/Qb2qAela5zA
Our collaboration solutions are unique to experience and very easy to use – but you have to see it to believe it. Please let me know your availability for a 15-minute virtual meeting.
During our virtual meeting, I will show you how PGi helps organizations improve their communication and collaboration. Please feel free to contact me at the information below. Otherwise, I will follow up with you shortly to be sure you received this email.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
P.S. If you are not the correct person to speak to about collaboration solutions within your organization, it would be great if you would direct me to the correct individual. Thanks in advance for your help!
